nodes.text: A species of mammals were small, predatory creatures native to the Forest Moon Endor. While considered cute and cuddly, the animals could become agitated when restless. When restless, they would bite or claw the perpetrator.
When the Human youngling Cindel Towani visited Endor, the native Ewok Wicket Warrick allowed her to play with one who was quite clearly scared of the child.
The Ewok Adventure contained many real animals, such as horses, goats, llamas and lizards, as well as ferrets, who were used for this species.
When Cindel is playing with the ferret, it is obviously quite scared, since it tries to bite her at least twice.
